text.value: If you go to the forest remember you can attack in four directions using ABXY, and dodge with RB.
Forest is south-west of the village, Zelda told me she will be there.
A blink is enough to make a peaceful man a warrior.
In for a green rupee in for a red rupee.
I love playing banjo in my free time, my grandpa Pete Seeger was a good teacher.
I think everybody can be happy with a banjo in their lives. Isn't It?
Hi Link! Did you see my grandma? She wasn't on the bed this morning.
It is the early bird that catches the worm.
Hey! You don't talk that much. I like you.
Good boy.
Appearances can be deceptive Link, I will become a strong warrior.
And remember, a bad writer blames his pen.
Sorry boy, but you are too small to go to the Castle alone.
This is the way to the Wildlands. The entrance is forbidden, It's so dangerous to go alone.
Make a favor to yourself, and stay safe in the village.
Hello! I'm the shopman. The prices are:
25 rupees x1 life potion.
10 rupees x1 stamina potion.
